name: Yadola
caption: Happy Birthday Sennn >.< !!! Thought I would do something this yearr ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

name: Kinphyre
caption: Happy birthday, Sen! You're amazing, an inspiration and a friend. I love your imagination, your humor and your gentleness. You deserve so much in this life, and I look forward to accompanying you on this journey! ❤️

name: Amy
caption: Happy Bday to my fav Chiloomfie!

name: Ela
caption: Happiest of birthdays to you, Sen! I wish you nothing but good food, lots of Childe, and fantastic luck on your special day 🥹 enjoy it, you deserve everything, girlie! 💖

name: Viktor
caption: Happy Birthday Akka! Pls buy me food I'm broke xD

name: Kittah
caption: Happy Birthday Sen! 💖 I'm almost done sketching and trying to submit a clean lineart at least. My app is just lagging and glitching on me 😭

name: Champsissy
caption: Happy Birthday Sen! You are such a blessing to our community and I look forward to every new art piece you deliver. Thank you for inspiring me with your love of chilumi and your incredible artwork! Hope you have a fantastic day and a wonderful year ahead! 💕

name: Fiamma Rosato
caption: Happy Birthday Sen! 🌹  I need a little more time to shove this in your face!
